condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: Normative guidance and quality assurance provided for the second annual review for 2019-2020 and annual planning for 2020-2021 in July 2020. Effective consolidation of Situation Reports (SitRep) and reporting of COVID-19 and continuation of capacity building of government and civil society organizations (CSOs) staff in data analysis and data use. UNICEF and implementing partners worked together to effectively and efficiently manage partnerships with 100 per cent Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers (HACT) compliance. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/08/2020

title.narrative: % of evaluation reports with formal management response over total evaluation completed
